item.title: CVE-2024-31237|2024-05-17T08:53:54.978Z -- WP Sharks -- s2Member Pro
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WP Sharks s2Member Pro allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects s2Member Pro: from n/a through 240315.
